text: HRr 7cfy <ToTHTi gfearoT TTIY / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7ev 9devt & TnTrf #i4) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j1-5 Va 6, 7727-10, &RaT, Tf frri} 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Environment/2022 Circular No_ 7.4.6/2022 dated 19th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/GHD/02/02/32/2022/001 (Computer No: 139850)} Sub.: Tree Transplantation Guidelines Standard Operating Protocol (SOP): The Green Highways Policy, 2015 has provided transplantation of trees instead of them during Highways development. As you are aware that transplantation of trees often becomes essential despite all precautions to retain trees during the design and development of highways. The Ministry of Road  Transport &  Highways has requested to the Ministry  of Environment; Forest and Climate Change to formulate the Tree Transplantation Policy as well as techniques for successful tree transplantation in the Country the appropriate Ministry for this purpose so that the States and the Project Authorities may follow this policy. However, it is found that the State Forest Departments in many States or the Regional Offices of MoEFGCC while according the Environmental Clearance or the Forest Clearance the condition of transplantation of trees in some projects Hence, keeping in view the above condition imposed for ECIFC clearance of the highway   projects, NHAI has prepared Tree Transplantation Guidelines Standard Operating Protocol (SOP) to carry out the tree transplantation process which is enclosed herewith for implementation till the Tree Transplantation Policy as well as techniques for the successful Tree Transplantation is formulated by MoEFGCC, 2 Itis further to bring to notice that tree transplantation is highly skilled and evolving Process because the survival of the transplanted trees and keeping them in good aesthetic shape is a difficult task. In this background, transplantation of trees must be resorted after conducting the feasibility study by technical and experienced professionals where transplantation of trees is to be done_ 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl. = As above O (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd) To: Chief General Manager (Coord ) All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 .
